name: 41021e06-f93d-4a90-a036-8f2bfb059cdf
displayName: URL Modify charges on a completed claim

text.text: How to Modify charges on a completed claim?

text: To modify charges on a completed claim, you can use the Charges page.

text.text: How do I Modify charges on a completed claim?

text: To modify charges on a completed claim, you can use the Charges tab. To get to the Claim page, enter the claim number or patient's last name in the search field and then click the claim number in the search results. On the Claim page, click the Incident details tab. Click the edit icon. You can also modify charges on a completed claim by clicking the edit icon on the Charges tab. You can also click inside the Add a charge field and select the mileage HCPCS from the list. In the "Units" field, enter the mileage amount.

text.text: Can I Modify charges on a completed claim?

text: To modify charges on a completed claim, you can use the Charges tab. To get to the Claim page, enter the claim number in search and then click the claim number in the search results. On the Charges tab, click the edit icon next to the total charge amount. On the line of the HCPCS you want to modify, click the edit pencil next to the price per unit. On the Override charge amount window, select the Custom amount for this claim button and enter the amount.
